alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 7:01PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lake and northwestern Volusia Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 700 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paisley, moving east at 10 mph. Additional strong storms will develop northward to Lake George. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pierson, DeLeon Springs, Barberville, Paisley, and Lake George. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
